During the faction war, I nearly lost Elie, my only daughter.

That experience changed everything for me, and from that moment on I've dedicated myself to the protection of others.

What price will you pay for peace in our time?

The Lightkeepers live by a simple code. This, is the Cursus Honorum.

1. When the powerful band together, their only goal should be to promote the greater good.
2. Conflict between guilds should only be an means to an end, not the end itself, and every effort must be made to protect bystanders from harm.
3. Those who follow the rules should be rewardedâ€”those who break them, left behind.
4. Nakatam Tower must be defended at all costs, lest the relics within be used for evil.
5. Trust, once earned, need never be questioned. Betrayal, once revealed, should never be forgotten.
